strategy_reasoning: Using a 'Retro RPG Inventory Update' theme perfectly bridges the gap between technical updates (tools, servers) and our cozy 8-bit brand aesthetic. It frames complex features like 'code_execution' as exciting 'new items' or 'power-ups' for the user's creative journey, making the changelog feel like a fun game patch note rather than dry dev-speak.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a tiny 8-bit bee character opening a glowing treasure chest in a digital garden. The chest emits a magical soft lime green (#ecf874) light. Background is a soft pastel lavender and peach gradient. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Pixel font text floating above says: 'NEW TOOLS'. Wholesome and nostalgic.
images.description: Cover image announcing new features as 'loot' or treasures found.

images.prompt: Retro RPG game inventory screen in cozy pixel art style. Beige parchment background with UI slots. Inside the slots are 8-bit pixel icons: a magnifying glass (Google Search), a tiny computer terminal (Code), a lightning bolt potion (SANA-Sprint), and a magic mirror (Filmirror). Soft shadows, warm lighting. Text in pixel font at the top: 'INVENTORY UPDATE'.
images.description: Visualizing the specific updates (Gemini tools, SANA speed, Filmirror app) as game items.

images.prompt: A tiny pixel art robot and a bee sweeping away small glitchy 'bug' sprites with a broom in a cozy room. Soft sunlight streaming through a window. Pastel colors, lime green accents. A speech bubble with a heart pixel icon. Represents bug fixes and optimizations. 8-bit aesthetic, cute and friendly.
images.description: Depicting the bug fixes (schema fix, gemini-fast fix) as a wholesome cleaning scene.

alt_text: A series of cozy 8-bit pixel art images. 1. A pixel bee opening a glowing lime green treasure chest. 2. A retro RPG inventory screen showing pixel icons for search, code, and speed. 3. Cute pixel characters sweeping away glitch bugs in a sunlit room.
